task.question: What evil thing did Eliashib do while Nehemiah was gone (Neh 13:6)?

choices.choice: Spent the tithes and offerings on himself
Gave Tobiah a room in the courts of the house of God
Opened the gates and allowed foreigners to enter Jerusalem
Would not distribute the food supplies to the Levites

task.answer: Gave Tobiah a room in the courts of the house of God

task.question: In what year of Artaxerxes did Nehemiah return to the king (Neh 13:6)?
Nehemiah says Artaxerxes was king of _______ when he returned after rebuilding the walls of Jerusalem (Neh 13:6)
What did Nehemiah do when he returned from being with Artaxerxes after he had rebuilt the walls (Neh 13:8)?

choices.choice: He threw all Tobiah’s household goods out of the storeroom
He built defenses against Tobiah and Sanballat
He built a palace for himself
He gave supplies from Artaxerxes to the fatherless and widows

task.answer: He threw all Tobiah’s household goods out of the storeroom

task.question: To whom had the assigned portions not been given when Nehemiah was away (Neh 13:10)?
When the Levites were not given their allotted portions how did they respond (Neh 13:10)?

choices.choice: They wrote a letter to Nehemiah
They refused to do the work of the temple
They protested to Ezra the scribe
They went back to their own fields

task.answer: They went back to their own fields

task.question: When Nehemiah found out the Levites were not receiving their allotments what did he ask the officals (Neh 13:10)?

choices.choice: Why is the house of God neglected?
Why have you neglected the Levites who serve God?
What have you done with the tithes and offerings?
How could you defy the Lord your God?

task.answer: Why is the house of God neglected?

task.question: After Nehemiah came back all Judah brought tithes of all of the following EXCEPT (Neh 13:11)
Nehemiah after he returned put over the storerooms all of the following EXCEPT (Neh 13:13)
Why did Nehemiah put Zadok the scribe over the storerooms (Neh 13:13)?

choices.choice: Because he was the chief officer
Because he knew the Book of the Law
